summary: barcelona club president josep maria bartomeu has insisted that the la liga leaders have no plans to replace luis enrique and they 're ` very happy ' with him . the 44-year-old took charge of the club last summer , signing a two-year-deal , and is only six games away from winning the title . barcelona president josep maria bartemou says the club are ` very happy ' with enrique 's performance .

2. Barca are 'very happy' with Enrique's performance.
3. Enrique only signed a two-year deal last summer.
4. Despite speculation, Bartomeu refutes claims that Enrique will be replaced.
5. Bartomeu says they're impressed with Enrique's performance.
6. Enrique is concentrating on La Liga and preparing for upcoming games.
7. Barca are still capable of winning three trophies this season.

explain: One core idea of this aspect is that Barcelona's president, Josep Maria Bartomeu, has stated that the club does not have any plans to replace coach Luis Enrique. Bartomeu is quoted as saying that the club is “very happy” with Enrique's performance and that they have no intention of looking for a new manager. This suggests that the club has full confidence in Enrique and his ability to lead them to success.

The given aspect reiterates the message that Barcelona's decision-makers are content with Luis Enrique's managerial performance. It implies that the club is pleased with the results that the Spanish coach has achieved since taking charge last summer and that they see him as the ideal person to lead the team towards victory. It also reinforces the president's statement a few sentences earlier, emphasizing that there is no plan to replace Enrique, despite his short-term contract. In short, this aspect underlines the appreciation and satisfaction that the club has towards Luis Enrique's guidance and leadership.

The aspect highlights that manager Luis Enrique only signed a two-year contract with Barcelona last summer, implying that his tenure with the club could be short-lived and raising questions about his long-term stability at the helm.

Despite speculation that Luis Enrique may be replaced as Barcelona's head coach, club president Josep Maria Bartomeu has refuted such claims, stating that the club is "very happy" with his performance.

Bartomeu's statement implies that the board of Barcelona football club is highly satisfied with Luis Enrique's performance as the head coach of the club. They acknowledge his abilities and efforts in bringing success to the club with his leadership.

Sure, I'd be happy to explain a core idea of the given aspect about Luis Enrique's preparation for upcoming games. 
One core idea is that Luis Enrique is focused on the present moment and is not getting distracted by external factors such as speculation about his future with the team. Instead, he is putting all his energy into the current season and preparing for the upcoming matches. By concentrating on the La Liga and the games at hand, he is demonstrating his commitment to the team and his dedication to achieving their goals together. It shows that he is a responsible coach who understands the importance of the present and that his main priority is to help Barcelona win.
Barca can still win three trophies this season even if they don't replace their coach.

The given aspect talks about how Barcelona comfortably defeated Valencia in their recent match. This indicates that the team was able to perform well and execute their game plan successfully in the game against Valencia.

The aspect notes that Luis Suarez and Lionel Messi, the two star strikers of Barcelona, were able to score goals in a recent match. This is an important and positive development for the team, as these two players are crucial to their success. Their ability to put the ball in the net will help ensure that Barcelona can continue to score goals and win matches. By identifying these two players as the scorers, the aspect underscores their value to the team and the impact they can have on the outcome of any given game.
